BossIntro: As soon as you started your descent into the depths of the temple, you were overcome by a feeling of imminent danger. As you proceeded into the darkness, it was as if the walls were closing in on you. ^ But there was nowhere to retreat to! Without the map of the cosmos, there was no chance for salvation. ^ Forward! All or nothing!
BossOutro: The Guardian has been defeated and the map of the cosmos is in your hands! ^ With this knowledge, it's finally time to set out in search of a place to call your new home. ^ I'm sure many other exciting adventures await our heroes, but now is the time for rest and celebration! ^ ^ Thank you for playing Dispersio 3!
Dream: And he had a vivid dream about a video game from his distant childhood...
LaunchPadIntro: But where to run? How can I escape this collapsing planet? The answer was obvious. ^ SPACE! ^ Any self-respecting military base should have a cosmodrome. I hope it at least has a rocket ready for launch.
LaunchPadOutro: 3... 2... 1... Lift off! ^ You barely had time to fly away before the planet shattered into pieces. Goodbye, sweet home. Maybe I can find something useful among this debris. ^ I'm lucky the crew was on board. Now the loneliness doesn't worry me, but what do I do now? ^ I think I should consult with the captain, maybe she'll have some good advice on the matter.
MilitaryBaseIntro: The day it all began. The deafening wail of a siren boded ill tidings. ^ Few knew that this geological research center was actually a secret military base. Only God knows what they were really doing there, but this time they've definitely gone too far. ^ It's time to run before it's too late!
